name: hhb-server
description: This is a sample client for Facebook's [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/) product and Instagram's [Subscriptions API](https://www.instagram.com/developer/subscriptions/), powered by [Node.js on Heroku](https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/getting-started-with-nodejs).
author: Jaap Barnhoorn
